channel.title: gio on gobbi
channel.description: Recent content in gio on gobbi

item.title: bitfields
item.description: AppInfoCreateFlags Flags used when creating a #GAppInfo. GAppInfoCreateFlags APP_INFO_CREATE_NONE 0 No flags. APP_INFO_CREATE_NEEDS_TERMINAL 1 Application opens in a terminal window. APP_INFO_CREATE_SUPPORTS_URIS 2 Application supports URI arguments. APP_INFO_CREATE_SUPPORTS_STARTUP_NOTIFICATION 4 Application supports startup notification. Since 2.26 ApplicationFlags Flags used to define the behaviour of a #GApplication. GApplicationFlags since 2.28 APPLICATION_FLAGS_NONE 0 Default APPLICATION_IS_SERVICE 1 Run as a service.

item.title: constants
item.description: DESKTOP_APP_INFO_LOOKUP_EXTENSION_POINT_NAME Extension point for default handler to URI association. See [Extending GIO][extending-gio]. G_DESKTOP_APP_INFO_LOOKUP_EXTENSION_POINT_NAME FILE_ATTRIBUTE_ACCESS_CAN_DELETE A key in the “access” namespace for checking deletion privileges. Corresponding #GFileAttributeType is %G_FILE_ATTRIBUTE_TYPE_BOOLEAN. This attribute will be %TRUE if the user is able to delete the file. G_FILE_ATTRIBUTE_ACCESS_CAN_DELETE FILE_ATTRIBUTE_ACCESS_CAN_EXECUTE A key in the “access” namespace for getting execution privileges. Corresponding #GFileAttributeType is %G_FILE_ATTRIBUTE_TYPE_BOOLEAN. This attribute will be %TRUE if the user is able to execute the file.

item.title: enums
item.description: BusType An enumeration for well-known message buses. GBusType since 2.26 BUS_TYPE_STARTER -1 An alias for the message bus that activated the process, if any. BUS_TYPE_NONE 0 Not a message bus. BUS_TYPE_SYSTEM 1 The system-wide message bus. BUS_TYPE_SESSION 2 The login session message bus. ConverterResult Results returned from g_converter_convert(). GConverterResult since 2.24 CONVERTER_ERROR 0 There was an error during conversion.
